name: how to connect arduino
info:
you have to give chmod 666 to /dev/USB0 to connect serial 

use 
lsusb

and you can also use this too
dmesg | grep tty

Both of these tests need to have a timer inject node placed in front of them.

name: TCS34725 Defunct Conversion
info:
These nodes were used with the Adafruit TCS34725 sensor to try and convert the different colors of light to predict the mmols. They were wildly off. 


The only one that was remotely close was the RGBWToMmol-10K node. The others didn't work at all. 

They were all created using PLS and then the derived coefficients were used to predict the equvilency. 

I have kept it here in case I want to bring it back. If I bring it back I will not connect it through an arduino I'll set up the photon and connect that way...It will end the USB shanananigans
